briefdescription.para: Number of bytes out of the RF payload used by the GPM headers.

detaileddescription.para: When reading or writing to the GPM, note that the byte count for the data bytes field must be <= (xbee.wpan_dev.payload - XBEE_GPM_OVERHEAD).

memberdef.name: xbee_gpm_frame_t

briefdescription.para: number of bytes in the data field (WRITE) or requested for a READ.

memberdef.argsstring: (const wpan_envelope_t *envelope, uint16_t block_num, uint16_t byte_offset, uint16_t byte_count, const void FAR *data)
memberdef.name: xbee_gpm_write

memberdef.argsstring: (const wpan_envelope_t *envelope, uint16_t block_num, uint16_t byte_offset, uint16_t byte_count, const void FAR *data)
memberdef.name: xbee_gpm_erase_then_write

memberdef.argsstring: (const wpan_envelope_t *envelope, uint16_t block_num, uint16_t byte_offset, uint16_t byte_count)
memberdef.name: xbee_gpm_read

briefdescription.para: General Purpose Memory interface, used on multiple module types (900HP, 868LP, Wi-Fi).

detaileddescription.para: Access is done by sending explicit API frames to the MEMORY_ACCESS cluster (0x23) of the DIGI_DEVICE endpoint (0xE6) of the target node, either in a self-addressed frame, or a frame addressed to a remote node.
